processing_structure.text: Specify input and output (one integer, sum of its divisors)
Loop from 1 to n and accumulate divisors

advice.text: You are in the coding stage: turn the remaining comments into code lines. You already read n and set sum, so focus next on the loop and the final print.
Decide loop behavior: iterate a counter from 1 up to n, check each if it evenly divides n, and add it to sum when it does.
Write a for-style loop that tests divisibility for each i and adds i to sum when true; after the loop, print the sum value.
